data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vivallo, Felipe, Zanella, Fernando César Vieira (2012): A new species of Centris (Paracentris) Cameron, 1903 from northeastern Brazil, with a key for the Centris species of the Caatinga region (Hymenoptera: Apidae). Zootaxa 3298: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280901
